headline: Goldman Sachs Remains Bullish on Devon Energy (DVN) Following Q3 2025 Results
summary: With significant hedge fund interest, Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) secures a spot on our list of the 12 best commodity stocks to buy right now. On November 13, 2025, Goldman Sachs’ Neil Mehta reiterated a “Buy” rating on Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) with a $42 price target. Earlier, on November 12, 2025, Devon Energy Corporation […]
